Sentencas: Doped lanthanum chromates are now commonly used to prepare composite cathodes for direct steam electrolysis.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: However, the limitation of electrochemical performances and cell current efficiency by insufficient electro-catalytic activity is a major challenge.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: This paper reports the use of reversibly exsolved catalytic metallic Ni nano-particles on A-site deficient and B-site excess perovskite (La0.75Sr0.25)(0.95)(Cr0.8Ni0.2)(0.95)Ni0.05O3-delta (LSCNNi), in order to achieve an activity-enhanced composite cathode via high-temperature reduction under reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the ceramic are investigated methodically and correlated with the performances of the composite electrodes in symmetric and electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: XRD, SEM, EDS and XPS results, confirm that the exsolution or dissolution of nano metallic catalyst is reversible in redox treatment cycles.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The Faradic efficiency reaches approximately 80% for the LSCNNi cathode with the flow of 5%H-2/Ar.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: Ultimately, the unified effect of metallic catalyst and redox-stable ceramic produce striking redox stability as well as electrochemical performances of the titled composite cathode.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The results signify that the composite cathode with exsolved nickel nano-particles, is a good potential fuel electrode for direct steam electrolysis in an oxygen-ion conducting solid oxide electrolyzer.
Titulo: Perovskite chromates cathode with resolved and anchored nickel nano-particles for direct high-temperature steam electrolysis
